word: H2385 - חֲזִיז - chăzîyz - khaw-zeez' - Bright cloud

sections.paragraph: a thunderbolt, a lightning flash, lightning, a storm, a cloud
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From an unused root meaning to glare; a flash of lightning: - bright cloud, lightning.
